name: vscode-unity-test-adapter
displayName: Unity Framework for C Test Explorer
description: Run your Unity tests in the Sidebar of Visual Studio Code
author: Florin Popescu

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

unityExplorer.debugConfiguration.description: Debug configuration to run during test debug

unityExplorer.foldersCommandArgs.markdownDescription: The command line arguments used to run the make target to create folders needed for the output

unityExplorer.prettyTestFileLabel.markdownDescription: Make test file asier to read in the test explorer, by removing its prefix, path and file type. E.g. inactive `test/LEDs/test_BlinkTask.c`, active `BlinkTask`

unityExplorer.prettyTestLabel.markdownDescription: Make test label easier to read in the test explorer, by removing its prefix. E.g. inactive `test_BlinkTaskShouldToggleLed`, active `BlinkTaskShouldToggleLed`

unityExplorer.projectSourcePath.description: Path to the project source files

unityExplorer.testBuildCommandArgs.markdownDescription: The command line arguments used to run the make target to build a test

unityExplorer.testBuildPath.description: Path to the test build output files

unityExplorer.testSourcePath.description: Path to the project test source files
